Topic.Title: Converting Quest Game into an App

Posts.EditableText: I uploaded my .quest file to QuestJS and it successfully downloaded. From there, I inserted into PhoneGap, and downloaded it as a .apk. The game installed fine, but when I boot it up, I can't click anything. Does anyone know a solution to this? Those two steps are all I did, but the game appears on the first screen and is unclickable when booted up. Also, if I want to upload this to Google Playstore afterwards, could someone help with that by providing a step by step process? Thanks! . I need this quite urgently as it's for a school project.
Posts.HTML: I uploaded my .quest file to QuestJS and it successfully downloaded. From there, I inserted into PhoneGap, and downloaded it as a .apk. The game installed fine, but when I boot it up, I can't click anything. Does anyone know a solution to this? Those two steps are all I did, but the game appears on the first screen and is unclickable when booted up. Also, if I want to upload this to Google Playstore afterwards, could someone help with that by providing a step by step process? Thanks! . I need this quite urgently as it's for a school project.

Posts.EditableText: If someone could also help me with just using the files from the conversion, because I'm told they're just files for a webpage, and put those onto a website, that would be of great help as well.
Posts.HTML: If someone could also help me with just using the files from the conversion, because I'm told they're just files for a webpage, and put those onto a website, that would be of great help as well.

Posts.EditableText: Did the game run and click fine after QuestJS but before PhoneGap (that is, just as an HTML game)?
